name: Gridwars: Tactics
description:
In Gridwars: Tactics, war fighting is no longer a human endeavor. Instead, the battlefield is inhabited solely by autonomous machines. In this robot eat robot conflict, you and your team must edge out the opposing squad and retire them forcefully, through better tactics, team work and marksmanship in this multiplayer, turn based shooter.

Controls

  • Space - Execute move
  • Control - Crouch
  • Left Click - Fire weapon
